title: New on Market – Marina Green Gem – Upscale Renovations
posting_body: Please respect our strict NO PET and NO SMOKING policies before your inquiry.
Terrific rent controlled 1 bedroom apartment in a prime Marina location.
Close to Marina Green and in the vicinity of Fort Mason, Moscone Park, Palace of fine Arts, Crissy Field, supermarket, restaurants, shopping and nightlife on Chestnut and Union streets.
Perfect for fitness and recreation.
Convenient for Muni and industry shuttle stops.
This apartment has been renovated with an upscale facelift.

Gorgeous kitchen with beautiful countertops, quality walnut finished cabinetry, deep under-mounted sink with new fixtures, ceramic tile flooring, new light fixtures and all new stainless steel appliances; dishwasher, fridge, gas range and over-the-range self venting microwave.
White tile bathroom with new amenities and large porcelain tub.
Rear corner unit with garden views.
9 foot tall ceilings with authentic period details.
Beautiful hardwood floors throughout.
Large amounts of storage with walk-in, linen and bedroom closets.
Freshly painted and is in immaculate condition.
Washroom with updated laundry machines located in the building.
Garbage, water and heat included.
Access to large backyard patio.
Attentive management.
One year lease minimum then month to month.
By appointment only.
Happy Hunting!
